Department: The department or team within the company for which the employee satisfaction score is being reported. This helps to categorize the satisfaction metrics by different organizational units.
Score_Percentage: The employee satisfaction score expressed as a percentage. This column provides insight into the level of satisfaction among employees in the specified department.
Reporting_Period: The specific quarter or time period during which the satisfaction survey was conducted. This helps in tracking changes in satisfaction over different periods.
Year: The calendar year in which the employee satisfaction survey was conducted. This is used for chronological tracking and analysis.
